author: Chas Danner
title: Navy Captain Who Was Removed From Command Has Coronavirus
description: Captain Crozier, who was removed from command of the U.S.S Theodore Roosevelt after sounding alarm about his coronavirus-stricken crew, has COVID-19.
content:
